name: Joseph of Descentia
description:
Did you ever wonder what happens to heroes after the kingdom is saved? Do they all just live happily ever after?

This game puts you in the role of Joseph, an old man living through one of his last days as the hero of the realm.

It's a short and conceptual exploration game. Not your typical RPG, so please take it with a grain of salt.

Joseph of Descentia (v1.0) was submitted to IGMC 2017
